original_text: while the Egyptians were burying all their firstborn, whom the Lord had struck down among them. On their gods also the Lord executed judgments.
korean_text: 애굽인은 여호와께서 그들 중에 치신 그 모든 장자를 장사하는 때라 여호와께서 그들의 신들에게도 벌을 주셨더라

sentences.original_text: while the Egyptians were burying all their firstborn
sentences.korean_translation: 이집트 사람들이 자기들의 장자들을 장사하는 동안에

sentences.original_text: whom the Lord had struck down among them
On their gods also the Lord executed judgments
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 또한 그들의 신들에게 심판을 내리셨다
